metadata.synopsis: The players discovered the corpse of a Flaming Fist underneath a pile of rocks. There is a hint to this in marcus' SWD.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load SCL_Main_ARoll amazingteleport to S_HAV_FlamingFistCorpseclick on the pile of rocks

0.speaker: Player
0.text: This is what Marcus buried? A dead Flaming Fist?
0.context: NodeContext: surprise at the dead body - player was expecting valuables of some kind

1.speaker: Player
1.text: A Flaming Fist? Someone beat her to a pulp.
1.context: NodeContext: grimacing, someone beat this woman's face in with a club
